contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox islands | name = Ilha Comprida | image name = SaoPaulo Municip IlhaComprida.svg | image caption = Location of Ilha Comprida in the state of São Paulo | image size = 250px | locator map = | map caption = | native name = | native name link = | location = Atlantic Ocean | coordinates = {{Coord|24.741|S|47.540|W|scale:1000000|display=inline}} | archipelago | total islands = | major islands = | area_sqmi = 72.78 | length_mi = 46 | width_mi = 2.5 | highest mount = | elevation_ft = 0 | country = Brazil | country admin divisions title = State | country admin divisions = [[São Paulo (state)|São Paulo]] | country admin divisions title 1 = | country admin divisions 1 = | country admin divisions title 2 = | country admin divisions 2 = | Largest City = | country largest city population = | Demonym = Ilha Compridense | population = 9,203 | population as of = 2011 | density_mi2 = 126.4 | ethnic groups = | additional info = }} '''Ilha Comprida''' ''(Long Island)'' is a [[municipality]] in the state of [[São Paulo (state)|São Paulo]] in [[Brazil]]. Stretching southwest along the Atlantic coast of the state, it is coextensive with the [[barrier island]] of Ilha Comprida, the longest of its kind in the state. The municipality was founded in 1992 after the merger of the tract of Ilha Comprida that belonged to the city of [[Cananéia]] with the section of the island that was administered by the city of [[Iguape]]. It has an average annual temperature of 24°C. The population in the 2011 census estimates was 9,203 and the area is 188.5 km². The elevation is at sea level. == References == {{Empty section|date=March 2013}} == External links == * [http://www.ilhacomprida.sp.gov.br Official site] [[Category:Populated places established in 1992]] [[Category:Islands of Brazil]] [[Category:Populated coastal places in São Paulo (state)]] {{SaoPauloState-geo-stub}}
